Rendering on GPU to off screen texture and reading bytes back to CPU. Measured from CPU pass submit to CPU read all bytes. 500ms pause between runs.
MacBook Pro (13-inch, M1, 2020)
Using WebGPU in Chrome Canary Version 106.0.5201.0

Rendering 0.4 to r32float:
